name: Noctua NH-D15 CPU Cooler
image_prompt: Noctua NH-D15 CPU cooler, dual tower design, two brown and beige 140mm fans, copper heatpipes visible
description: Premium dual-tower CPU cooler with six heatpipes and two NF-A15 140mm fans. Delivers exceptional cooling performance while maintaining near-silent operation. Includes NT-H1 thermal paste.

reviews.review_text: Keeps my 13900K cool and quiet. Air cooling king.
Ugly color but who cares when it performs this well.
Massive cooler. Check RAM clearance before buying.
